block.p: Robin Wagge and Dr. John Joseph Lucas are to be married today at the cecilia de Torres Gallery in Manhattan. Judge Shirley Kornreich of Civil Court in Manhattan is to officiate.
Robin Wagge and Dr. John Joseph Lucas are to be married today at the cecilia de Torres Gallery in Manhattan. Judge Shirley Kornreich of Civil Court in Manhattan is to officiate.

Ms. Wagge, 49, will keep her name. She is a senior vice president at Rubenstein Associates, the Manhattan public relations firm. She graduated from Trinity College in Hartford and was a soloist in the Hartford Ballet. She is the daughter of Bernice and Norman Wagge of Boca Raton, Fla. Ms. Wagge's father, who is retired, owned Associated Services, an insurance agency in Waterbury, Conn. Her mother, also retired, was the director of reading programs for the Waterbury public schools.

Dr. Lucas, 50, is a psychiatrist specializing in addiction and forensic psychiatry in Goshen, N.Y. He graduated from Brown University and received his medical degree from Pennsylvania State University. He is the son of Mary Lucas Sr., who had a dental practice in Hershey.
The bride's previous marriage ended in divorce, as did the bridegroom's.
